tool_description: Maps genetic markers to their chromosomal positions using reference genome builds and handles coordinate system conversions.

reference_build.description: Reference genome build: hg19, hg38, grch37, grch38

map_unplaced_contigs.description: Attempt to map markers on unplaced contigs

distance_threshold.description: Maximum distance in base pairs for position matching

error_messages: Unsupported reference build: Use one of [hg19, hg38, grch37, grch38].
